name: BitFi Bitcoin
description: BitFi is a CeDeFi asset management platform that enables users to earn native, risk-managed yields while keeping on-chain liquidity. The bfBTC is BitFiâ€™s Bitcoin staking and yield product. Users deposit BTC assets (e.g., BTC, BTCB, hemiBTC) across supported networks to mint bfBTC at a real-time exchange ratio. These tokens represent claims on the underlying assets plus accrued returns and can be burned to redeem at any time.
